contract_id.description: UUID of the contract related to the new order to be created

order_name.description: Name of the new order to be created

start_date.description: Start date of the order in format %Y-%m-%d. Must be higher than the contract start date and actual date

end_date.description: End date of the order in format %Y-%m-%d. Must be lower than the contract end date

account_id.description: UUID of the account related to the order to be created
